</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Shows or hides the compass on the map screen, if enabled for the mission and you possess the item. (default [[true]]) </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''showCompass''' show </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> show: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[showCompass]] [[false]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[shownCompass]], [[visibleCompass]], [[showGPS]], [[showRadio]], [[showWatch]], [[showPad]], [[showMap]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 16 Aug, 2009
<dt class="note">[[User:Generalcarver|GeneralCarver]]<dd class="note">
In Arma 2, the Compass is now an inventory item. Class path is CfgWeapons->ItemCompass. Use the commands addWeapon and removeWeapon to add or remove it from a unit's inventory. (example: player addweapon "ItemCompass") 


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
